DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine toxicity allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell transplantation patient metastatic unresectable small cell lung cancer , breast cancer , testicular germ cell cancer , melanoma , renal cell cancer . II . Determine efficacy regimen patient . OUTLINE : Donors receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) subcutaneously 4 5 day prior peripheral blood stem cell harvest . Patients assign one three conditioning regimen , depend disease . Group A ( small cell lung cancer ) : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1-2 hour day -7 -6 , etoposide IV 4 hour day -5 , total body irradiation twice daily day -4 -1 . Group B ( breast cancer testicular germ cell cancer ) : Patients receive oral busulfan every 6 hour day -7 -4 total 14 dos . Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1-2 hour day -3 -2 . Group C ( renal cell cancer melanoma ) : Patients receive fludarabine IV daily day -8 -4 cyclophosphamide IV day -3 -2 . All group : Patients receive allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell IV 10-20 minute day 0 . Patients follow weekly 3 month , 6 12 month , yearly 5 year .
